The '''touched''' were mages that [[Mystra]] commissioned for a task, offering a small amount of power in exchange.{{cite book/Secrets of the Magister|121-122}}
document_data.Commission: When [[Mystra]] liked a mage's character, she sometimes appeared to them in private as a blue radiance and offered them power in exchange for a service.
document_data.Tasks: The tasks of the Touched could be small indeed, such as casting spells of [[wild magic]] into a [[dead magic]] zone, or they could be more major, such as destroying an [[enchanted]] object at a particular, dangerous location. Even political tasks could be asked of one so touched.
document_data.Completion: After completion, though the powers vanished, they usually kept some minor magic, such as a ''[[light]]'' or ''[[feather fall]]'' spell useable at will, or a strong resistance to one school of magic. Those who missed the power overmuch could petition to become a [[Pursuivant Arcane]], or even a ''[[weavespinner]]''.
